update `CBOA` set CBOA02 = #{cboa02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOA03 = #{cboa03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA04 = #{cboa04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOA05 = #{cboa05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA06 = #{cboa06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA07 = #{cboa07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA08 = #{cboa08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOA09 = #{cboa09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA10 = #{cboa10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA11 = #{cboa11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA12 = #{cboa12,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA13 = #{cboa13,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOA14 = #{cboa14,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA15 = #{cboa15,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOA16 = #{cboa16,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA17 = #{cboa17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA18 = #{cboa18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA19 = #{cboa19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA20 = #{cboa20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA21 = #{cboa21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA22 = #{cboa22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA23 = #{cboa23,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA24 = #{cboa24,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA25 = #{cboa25,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA26 = #{cboa26,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOA27 = #{cboa27,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOA28 = #{cboa28,jdbcType=INTEGER}, confirm_sku_status = #{confirmSkuStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where CBOA01 = #{cboa01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT oa.CBOA01 as id, oa.CBOA07 as orderNo, oa.CBOA25 as customerNo, oa.CBOA02 as createTime, ca.CBCA08 as customerName, u.nick_name as saleUser, oa.CBOA16 AS settleCurrent, oa.CBOA17 as receiver, oa.CBOA18 as address, oa.CBOA19 as phone, oa.CBOA27 as orderClass, oa.CBOA24 as orderType, oa.CBOA08 as orderDate, oa.CBOA11 as status
FROM `CBOA` oa LEFT JOIN CBCA ca on oa.CBOA09 =ca.CBCA01 LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id =oa.CBOA10 where oa.CBOA06=0 and oa.CBOA27=2 and (oa.CBOA11=2 || oa.CBOA11=5)
and oa.CBOA08 >= #{startTime}
and oa.CBOA08 <=#{endTime}
and oa.CBOA07 like concat('%', #{orderNo}, '%')
and ca.CBCA08 like concat('%', #{customer}, '%')
order by oa.CBOA02 DESC
mapper.insert: insert into `CBOA` (CBOA01, CBOA02, CBOA03, CBOA04, CBOA05, CBOA06, CBOA07, CBOA08, CBOA09, CBOA10, CBOA11, CBOA12, CBOA13, CBOA14, CBOA15, CBOA16, CBOA17, CBOA18, CBOA19, CBOA20, CBOA21, CBOA22, CBOA23, CBOA24, CBOA25, CBOA26, CBOA27, CBOA28) values (#{cboa01,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cboa03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cboa05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cboa09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa12,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa13,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cboa14,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa15,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cboa16,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa23,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa24,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa25,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa26,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cboa27,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cboa28,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select:
SELECT oa.CBOA01 AS value
, oa.CBOA07 AS label FROM `CBOA` oa WHERE oa.CBOA06 =0 and oa.CBOA11=5
and oa.CBOA07 like concat('%', #{selectMsg}, '%')
order by oa.CBOA02 DESC
